gif.alt: A video showing how to ask a user for a value in Trinket

trinket-ask-step-1.step_text: From the text menu, drag the prompt user for input block to your canvas.
trinket-ask-step-1.alt: Shows the procedure for dragging the ask block to canvas

trinket-ask-step-2.step_text: Snap the prompt user block to a variable to store the input and enter a prompt phrase (if applicable).
trinket-ask-step-2.alt: Shows the placement of the prompt block

trinket-ask-step-3.step_text: When the program is run, your user will be prompted for input in the "run" console.
trinket-ask-step-3.alt: Shows prompting a user for input in the run console
